title: I'm buying a home and want home sellers and realtors to reach out to me (not with Zillow). What platform can I use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Get a buyers agent and you gain access to their paid subscription to the multiple listing service in your area. Typically, sellers pay commissions, (not always but typically), so it’s really weird not to find a good buyers agent.

I’m not aware of any “platform” that would do what you’re asking. Why not ask friends & coworkers for a recommendation for a local Realtor? Meet with two or three and pick one to work with. Remember the buyer’s Realtor’s commission is paid by the seller.
